resources.string:
To keep unwanted eyes from viewing your private messages, encrypt them!! This app uses the popular Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) to encrypt your text. 

* First, enter the text you want to encrypt into the text box provided and hit the "Encode" button. You will be given your encrypted text along with a randomly generated key. 

* Next have the recipient enter your encrpyted text and your key to view your message. 

** Make sure and keep your key safe so that you can decrypt your messages later!! If you lose your key it is gone forever! **
A little back history about aes
